data: Before swinging out of the saddle in front of the little school house which was serving as a church, Curtis Clayton, physician and philosopher, looked over the valley which held the story of a romantic hope and where he was to bury his own shattered dream.
Whitson, John Harvey, 1854-1936; Becher, Arthur E., 1877-1960 [Illustrator]
